email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the mid-40s, say $48.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer a revised rate of $49.25 per metric ton. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. The rate is closer to our target, but we’d like to push for $48.75 per metric ton. Also, can we extend the laytime to 96 hours to accommodate potential delays? Let me know if this is feasible. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I appreciate your persistence. After further negotiation, the owner has agreed to $48.75 per metric ton and a laytime of 96 hours. Demurrage remains at $25,000 per day pro rata. If this works for you, we can proceed with the fixture. Let me know. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that sounds good to us. Let’s proceed with the fixture at $48.75 per metric ton, 96 hours laytime, and $25,000 per day demurrage. Please send over the contract for review. Thanks for your help! Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll prepare the contract and send it over for your review by end of day. Thanks for your patience throughout this negotiation. Looking forward to working together on this shipment. Best regards, Sarah
